workExperience.description: Online-zoo is a platform where information about animals from various zoos with webcams is collected. It is assumed that the user can open a page with zoo resources, observe any of the animals or make a donation for which food will be purchased. As part of the task, it was necessary to make adaptive layout and interactivity of the main page, and pages with donations.
The photographer's one-page website. Adaptive and interactive

A music player that allows you to play music tracks in turn or flip through them by clicking on buttons. Each music track has a specific background image. An audio player with the ability to play several tracks sequentially, flipping through them.
An application that displays information about movies at the user's request.
